nodes.text: The Coral Banks were a series of reefs in the Southern Passage, a sea which straddled the southern coastline of Alanciar, a continent on the Wild Space planet of Kesh. The Coral Banks were a popular haunt for the Alanciari harvester fleet. During Quarra Thayn's visit to Point Defiance, her host and lover Jogan Halder suggested taking her on a rowboat to the Coral Banks on the following morning. This trip never occurred due to the Lost Tribe of Sith's invasion of Alanciar that very night.
